resources.string: Being underweight is associated with certain medical conditions, including anorexia, type 1 diabetes, hyperthyroidism, cancer, or tuberculosis.
Keeping to a healthy weight and being more physically active will help you feel stronger and give you more energy.
Being overweight or fat is having more body fat than is optimally healthy. Being overweight is especially common where food supplies are plentiful and lifestyles are sedentary.
Obesity is most commonly caused by a combination of excessive food intake, lack of physical activity, and genetic susceptibility.
If you’re extremely obese, losing weight can mean “less heart disease, less diabetes and less cancer,” said Robert Eckel, M.D., past president of the American Heart Association.
